summary.purpose: Root project barrel export providing namespaced access to all library modules (Assets, Components, Helpers, Hooks, Types). Primary entry point for consuming akeyless-client-commons library.
summary.problem_solved: Enables clean namespace organization for library consumers: import { components, helpers, hooks, types } from 'akeyless-client-commons' rather than importing from scattered module paths.

internal.why_used: SVG components and table utility functions
All React components (UI, forms, tables, utilities)
Utility functions (API routing, Firebase operations, form validation, time/phone helpers)
Custom React hooks (state management, Firestore subscriptions, Web Worker integration)
All TypeScript type definitions and interfaces

exports.name: helpers
exports.description_one_line: Helpers namespace (API, Firebase, forms, time, phone utilities)

details.what_it_does: Namespaced export of assets module containing SVG components (GreenVSvg, RedXSvg, etc.) and table utility functions for Excel export and cell rendering

Namespaced export of components module: all React components organized by type (UI primitives, form builders, data tables, utility components). Includes CodeInput for OTP inputs, ErrorBoundary for error handling, and specialized table sub-components with custom cell renderers

Namespaced export of utility functions: nxApiCall (authenticated API routing), Firebase operations (CRUD, subscriptions, storage), email attachment creation, Excel export, Socket.io integration, form validation (regex patterns, input handlers), permission checking, time/date formatting, and phone number conversion utilities

Namespaced export of custom React hooks: useDocumentTitle, useSetUserCountry (global hooks), useWebWorker for Web Worker integration, useDbSnapshots/useDbDocumentSnapshots/useSmartSnapshots/useSocketSnapshots for Firestore real-time subscriptions, and table hooks (useTableContext, useFilter, useSort, useDisplayToggle, useSearch, useCreateTableStore)

Namespaced export of all TypeScript type definitions: form element interfaces (InputElement, SelectElement, MultiSelectProps, etc.), ModularFormProps, Firebase types (User, Car, Location data structures), global types (environment config, geolocation), and snapshot listener configuration types
